52 namespace pilz_industrial_motion_planner
53 {
54 TrajectoryGeneratorLIN::TrajectoryGeneratorLIN(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model,
55  const LimitsContainer& planner_limits)
56  : TrajectoryGenerator::TrajectoryGenerator(robot_model, planner_limits)
57 {
58  if (!planner_limits_.hasFullCartesianLimits())
59  {
60  ROS_ERROR("Cartesian limits not set for LIN trajectory generator.");
61  throw TrajectoryGeneratorInvalidLimitsException("Cartesian limits are not fully set for LIN trajectory generator.");
62  }
63 }
64 
65 void TrajectoryGeneratorLIN::extractMotionPlanInfo(const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& scene,
66  const planning_interface::MotionPlanRequest& req,
67  TrajectoryGenerator::MotionPlanInfo& info) const
68 {
69  ROS_DEBUG("Extract necessary information from motion plan request.");
70 
71  info.group_name = req.group_name;
72  std::string frame_id{ robot_model_->getModelFrame() };
73 
74  // goal given in joint space
75  if (!req.goal_constraints.front().joint_constraints.empty())
76  {
77  info.link_name = robot_model_->getJointModelGroup(req.group_name)->getSolverInstance()->getTipFrame();
78 
79  if (req.goal_constraints.front().joint_constraints.size() !=
80  robot_model_->getJointModelGroup(req.group_name)->getActiveJointModelNames().size())
81  {
82  std::ostringstream os;
83  os << "Number of joints in goal does not match number of joints of group "
84  "(Number joints goal: "
85  << req.goal_constraints.front().joint_constraints.size() << " | Number of joints of group: "
86  << robot_model_->getJointModelGroup(req.group_name)->getActiveJointModelNames().size() << ")";
87  throw JointNumberMismatch(os.str());
88  }
89  // initializing all joints of the model
90  for (const auto& joint_name : robot_model_->getVariableNames())
91  {
92  info.goal_joint_position[joint_name] = 0;
93  }
94 
95  for (const auto& joint_item : req.goal_constraints.front().joint_constraints)
96  {
97  info.goal_joint_position[joint_item.joint_name] = joint_item.position;
98  }
99 
100  // Ignored return value because at this point the function should always
101  // return 'true'.
102  computeLinkFK(robot_model_, info.link_name, info.goal_joint_position, info.goal_pose);
103  }
104  // goal given in Cartesian space
105  else
106  {
107  info.link_name = req.goal_constraints.front().position_constraints.front().link_name;
108  if (req.goal_constraints.front().position_constraints.front().header.frame_id.empty() ||
109  req.goal_constraints.front().orientation_constraints.front().header.frame_id.empty())
110  {
111  ROS_WARN("Frame id is not set in position/orientation constraints of "
112  "goal. Use model frame as default");
113  frame_id = robot_model_->getModelFrame();
114  }
115  else
116  {
117  frame_id = req.goal_constraints.front().position_constraints.front().header.frame_id;
118  }
119  geometry_msgs::Pose goal_pose_msg;
120  goal_pose_msg.position =
121  req.goal_constraints.front().position_constraints.front().constraint_region.primitive_poses.front().position;
122  goal_pose_msg.orientation = req.goal_constraints.front().orientation_constraints.front().orientation;
123  normalizeQuaternion(goal_pose_msg.orientation);
124  tf2::fromMsg(goal_pose_msg, info.goal_pose);
125  }
126 
127  assert(req.start_state.joint_state.name.size() == req.start_state.joint_state.position.size());
128  for (const auto& joint_name : robot_model_->getJointModelGroup(req.group_name)->getActiveJointModelNames())
129  {
130  auto it{ std::find(req.start_state.joint_state.name.cbegin(), req.start_state.joint_state.name.cend(), joint_name) };
131  if (it == req.start_state.joint_state.name.cend())
132  {
133  std::ostringstream os;
134  os << "Could not find joint \"" << joint_name << "\" of group \"" << req.group_name
135  << "\" in start state of request";
136  throw LinJointMissingInStartState(os.str());
137  }
138  size_t index = it - req.start_state.joint_state.name.cbegin();
139  info.start_joint_position[joint_name] = req.start_state.joint_state.position[index];
140  }
141 
142  // Ignored return value because at this point the function should always
143  // return 'true'.
144  computeLinkFK(robot_model_, info.link_name, info.start_joint_position, info.start_pose);
145 
146  // check goal pose ik before Cartesian motion plan starts
147  std::map<std::string, double> ik_solution;
148  if (!computePoseIK(scene, info.group_name, info.link_name, info.goal_pose, frame_id, info.start_joint_position,
149  ik_solution))
150  {
151  std::ostringstream os;
152  os << "Failed to compute inverse kinematics for link: " << info.link_name << " of goal pose";
153  throw LinInverseForGoalIncalculable(os.str());
154  }
155 }
156 
157 void TrajectoryGeneratorLIN::plan(const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& scene,
158  const planning_interface::MotionPlanRequest& req, const MotionPlanInfo& plan_info,
159  const double& sampling_time, trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory& joint_trajectory)
160 {
161  // create Cartesian path for lin
162  std::unique_ptr<KDL::Path> path(setPathLIN(plan_info.start_pose, plan_info.goal_pose));
163 
164  // create velocity profile
165  std::unique_ptr<KDL::VelocityProfile> vp(
166  cartesianTrapVelocityProfile(req.max_velocity_scaling_factor, req.max_acceleration_scaling_factor, path));
167 
168  // combine path and velocity profile into Cartesian trajectory
169  // with the third parameter set to false, KDL::Trajectory_Segment does not
170  // take
171  // the ownship of Path and Velocity Profile
172  KDL::Trajectory_Segment cart_trajectory(path.get(), vp.get(), false);
173 
174  moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes error_code;
175  // sample the Cartesian trajectory and compute joint trajectory using inverse
176  // kinematics
177  if (!generateJointTrajectory(scene, planner_limits_.getJointLimitContainer(), cart_trajectory, plan_info.group_name,
178  plan_info.link_name, plan_info.start_joint_position, sampling_time, joint_trajectory,
179  error_code))
180  {
181  std::ostringstream os;
182  os << "Failed to generate valid joint trajectory from the Cartesian path";
183  throw LinTrajectoryConversionFailure(os.str(), error_code.val);
184  }
185 }
186 
187 std::unique_ptr<KDL::Path> TrajectoryGeneratorLIN::setPathLIN(const Eigen::Affine3d& start_pose,
188  const Eigen::Affine3d& goal_pose) const
189 {
190  ROS_DEBUG("Set Cartesian path for LIN command.");
191 
192  KDL::Frame kdl_start_pose, kdl_goal_pose;
193  tf2::fromMsg(tf2::toMsg(start_pose), kdl_start_pose);
194  tf2::fromMsg(tf2::toMsg(goal_pose), kdl_goal_pose);
195  double eqradius = planner_limits_.getCartesianLimits().getMaxTranslationalVelocity() /
196  planner_limits_.getCartesianLimits().getMaxRotationalVelocity();
197  KDL::RotationalInterpolation* rot_interpo = new KDL::RotationalInterpolation_SingleAxis();
198 
199  return std::unique_ptr<KDL::Path>(new KDL::Path_Line(kdl_start_pose, kdl_goal_pose, rot_interpo, eqradius, true));
200 }
201 
202 } // namespace pilz_industrial_motion_planner
